headline: Can L'Oréal's (ENXTPA:OR) Dr.G Launch Reveal a Shift in Its Global Expansion Playbook?
summary: Dr.G has officially launched in the United States, exclusively through Amazon, marking the brand’s debut under the L'Oréal Group and highlighting the convergence of dermatologist-led K-beauty with mainstream accessibility. This move underscores L'Oréal's commitment to leveraging global clinical expertise and digital-first distribution to reach diverse consumer segments in new markets. We'll examine how the U.S. launch of Dr.G illustrates L'Oréal's ongoing adaptation to consumer trends and...
